manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Toberto 44MP 1080P Digital Camera - Your Kids' First Digital Camera for Photography FHD 1080P 44MP Kid's Digital Camera With FHD 1080P video resolution and a remarkable 44MP image resolution, coupled with an advanced CMOS system, you can capture and record your most exciting and memorable moments with stunning clarity and detail. Your First Choice for Photography Equipped with a range of features, including 16X digital zoom, Anti-shake, face detection, white balance, continuous shooting, self-timer, video recording with pause functionality, and 20 different filters, this 2023 NEWEST digital camera is an ideal choice for those interested in simple yet creative photography. The Perfect Gift Option With its stylish appearance and palm-sized compact shape, this digital camera makes for the perfect gift. Its super-easy-to-operate features make it suitable for beginners, kids, teens, students, and the elderly. Say goodbye to complicated settings and hello to capturing wonderful moments with just the press of a button. What you will Get? A digital camera, a 32GB TF card, a rechargeable battery, USB cable and adapter, a camera bag, a lanyard, a lens/LCD screen cleaning cloth, and a user manual.All these accessories are included to ensure that the camera is ready to use straight out of the box.

Flash Light With a built-in flash light, it allows you to take clear pictures even in low light conditions. 16X Digital Zoom Use the 16x digital zoom to get closer to your subjects and make sure you don't miss any detail. Face and Smile Detection With its Face and Smile Capture feature, our camera keenly detects faces and smiles, capturing the most lively and authentic moments.

3 Continuous Shooting Capture a series of photos in quick succession, it is easier to capture your best moments and never miss a single shot of your wonderful life. Anti Shake Anti-shake function prevents a handshake and stabilizes the image you’re taking, say good bye to blurry images. Self-Timer Take advantage of the time-lapse shooting function that allows you to set a delay of 2 sec, 5 sec, or 10 sec before the camera starts capturing pictures

Webcam for Live Streaming and Easy to Transfer Webcam The vlogging digital camera can work as a webcam for live streaming and video calling. How can I activate the webcam mode? Turn off the camera, and then connect it to the computer via USB cable. Long press the "Power" and "Shutter" button at the same time, then the camera will switch to webcam/live stream mode. How to Download the Files? Connect the camera directly to a computer via the USB cable, and then transfer files to your computer and share it to your social medias.Or Put the SD card into a card reader(Not Included) and plug the card reader into a computer to start the transfer.or with an extra OTG adapter (Not Included) and card reader (Not Included), put the memory card on the card reader, connect them directly to your phone, and transfer files directly to your phone!
Perfect Digital Camera for Boys and Girls As a Gift for Birthdays, Xmas, Important Holidays, etc.

Specification: Video:1080P / 720P / 480P Image: 44MP/ 42MP/ 36MP/ 24MP...... Auto Power-Off: 1min/ 2min/ 3 min/ 4min/ 5min/ 10min/ Off File format: image format: JPG, Video format: AVI White Balance: Auto/Daylight/Cloudy/Fluorescent /Tungsten Memory Card: TF card, Supports U1 Class 10 max up to 32 GB TF Card Date/Time Watermark: Yes, On/Off Radio Record: Built-in microphone Warm Tips: Please format the memory card at the first time and use the supplied memory card and USB charging cable.Please fully charge the battery before first time using this digital camera.We recommend this digital camera to 5-12 years old kids who are interested in photography, not for the professional. For any questions, please don't hesitate to contact our customer support for help, we usually respond to your consult less than 12 hours and offer you a hassle-free 18-month free return or replacement.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Little Starter Camera
reviews.reviewText: Great Little Starter Camera for the cost - light weight, intuitive and easy to use. Nice size screen and buttons have a quality feel. Great to have fun with your friends when out and about.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little camera
reviews.reviewText: Bought this as a gift for my daughter. She absolutely loves it. The size, picture quality, and ease of use are perfect for her. Recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought this as a Christmas present for my niece age 11 and she loves it. It is easy to use and lightweight. Perfect for the kids that love to take their own pictures.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great kids camera
reviews.reviewText: If you are looking for an inexpensive decent camera for the kids here ya go! It doesn't have games like other kids camera (which I didn't want anyway) But I wanted a camera that was going to at least take some decent picture for our trip without spending a ton of money. I bought 3 of these. They all come with everything you need. they have flash, you can delete unwanted photos, the picture quality isn't as grainy as the "kid" cameras. The picture quality obviously is not like a 200-2,000 dollar camera but it is defiantly better than the ones labeled for kids.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and easy to use
reviews.reviewText: I bought this camera for my niece and it is the perfect beginner camera. It came with EVERYTHING she could need. Charger, USB to plug into the computer, memory card AND an extra battery. This was super easy for her to use and she loved it. It takes great pictures and it’s super light so it doesn’t weigh you down. The description was super accurate and I am definitely not disappointed!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I got this for my 8 yr old daughter. It’s perfect for her. Takes good pictures, nice and light and comes with a second battery which is nice!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Christmas present
reviews.reviewText: Was looking for something small cute and not bulky and you can take it anywhere to take good quality photos and comes with everything you need which are batteries and a usb to submit photos into computer

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for kids. Easy to use
reviews.reviewText: These were Christmas gifts for our almost 5 and 8 year olds and they love them. They are easy to use and seems like they take decent pictures. They can easily view their photos and delete if needed.
